description:
1. Overview | How exactly do you build a successful Kindle publishing business?

- Kindle business outline and Key concept to succeeding on building a Kindle business

2. Easy method to come up with book topics that sell

- How to do research to find a profitable book niche

- Finding an angle for book to differentiate and stand out

3. 3 steps to getting other people to write your books

- How to outsource book creation / How do you actually hire writers to write your book for you

- What do you do with payments for writers

- How to create book covers that stand out

4. How to not get rejected Amazon! Get your book accepted the first try

- How to format a book and put it up for sale

5. Little actions to help you triple sales - important optimization techniques

- How to optimize book so it gets more sales

- Ways to promote book so it ranks higher on Amazon

6. How to build a solid, long-term Kindle business - Additional Monetization strategies

- How to sell products with your books

- Introduction to fulfillment by Amazon

- Selling coaching services through Kindle
title: Earn Passive Income with Kindle Publishing
